sample_labor_actions.title: Tech Workers Strike at Example Corp
sample_labor_actions.description: Workers at Example Corp are striking for better wages, improved working conditions, and union recognition. The strike began on January 15th and involves over 1,000 employees.

sample_labor_actions.title: Consumer Boycott of FastFood Chain
sample_labor_actions.description: A nationwide boycott is in effect due to unfair labor practices and wage theft. Join us in supporting workers by choosing alternative restaurants.

sample_labor_actions.title: Warehouse Workers Picket Line
sample_labor_actions.description: Warehouse workers have established a picket line demanding safer working conditions and fair treatment. Show your support by respecting the picket line.

api_format_notes.description: This is a sample data file showing the expected format for labor actions API (v3.1)
api_format_notes.logo_format_note: unionLogoUrl now returns URL paths (e.g., /union_logos/uaw.png) instead of base64 data
